Posts.Content: Oct 28, 2014 09:01PM snyder5229 wrote: Thank you so much. I've been having severe anxiety since my diagnosis just 5 days ago. I'm more scared then I've been my entire life. This was beautiful and has eased some of my fears. I hope to write one of these letters to myself one day.Â
